name: com.unity.demoteam.mesh-to-sdf
description: A real-time SDF generator. Use a Mesh or a dynamically deforming SkinnedMesh as input to generate a 3D SDF texture.

samples.description: A simple scene with MeshToSDF generating an SDF for a rotating static mesh. Scene variants for HDRP, URP, and Built-in RP.
